ThingDef.label: tau leather
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Tau skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.

ThingDef.label: kroot leather
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Kroot skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.

ThingDef.label: knarloc leather
ThingDef.description: Strong leather, almost as strong as the animal it came from. It's definitely prestigious to wear anything made out of knarloc leather, as a legacy of the hunt. This leather particularly insulates well against heat.

ThingDef.label: kroot hound leather
ThingDef.description: The semi-strong leather of a kroot hound. Compared to most leather, it is a bit tougher and while it insulates against all kinds of temperature, this particular type works better against the heat.

ThingDef.label: chitinous leather
ThingDef.description: The hide of a Vespid is strange, not quite soft enough to be leather, not quite hard enough to be chitin, but that just makes it malleable and thick enough to be great for cold weather protection.

ThingDef.label: eldar leather
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, scraped eldar skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.

ThingDef.label: ork leather
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Ork skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
